About the Company: A2Z Maintenance & Engineering Services Limited is engaged in providing services to the power transmission and distribution sector with a focus primarily on the distribution segment.The company is diversifying this business to provide EPC services to power generation companies and companies in other sectors, including road and telecommunications. In addition, it is significantly involved in other businesses that include generating power from renewable energy sources (Renewable Energy Generation business), providing municipal solid waste management services (the MSW business), providing facility management services (the FMS business) and developing information technology (IT) solutions for power utilities (the Power IT Solutions business). .The company also engagged in the business of ES.
